name: The Adventures of Smudge the Rabbit
name_original: The Adventures of Smudge the Rabbit
description:
Play has an ink rabbit trying to escape. In order to escape you must find and type the words that complete sentences. Watch out for the water this is following behind you, it might sweep you away.

Controls:

Type the words in the text box in order to progress

Credits:

Kailey Phan Mitchell

Special thanks to Thomas, Zac and Will for the programming help and for being patient with me. This game was created for my GAM 355: Solo Game Development class.
